attributes.additional_details:
The new variant of the virus is spread more easily in children, as said by scientists. 
When ALL Educational Establishments shut last August, the amount of deaths/new infections dropped dramatically. Why isn't this being put into consideration?
On a day to day basis, up to 30 bubbles mix everyday in a Nursery and Preschool.
This is just as dangerous as a secondary school or college.
Children 3-5 will not wear a mask and do NOT understand social distancing.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to put play workers into consideration and Shut Preschools and Nurseries, which would then re-open in February, along with secondary schools and colleges.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
